layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584

          LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x18

                text run at (0,0) width 166: "This text should be green."
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,18) size 784x0
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,18) size 784x0
